cols.h5Detail:
One. Commodity introduction

1. This product is a brand new American Amazon number (outlook first order number)
2. The delivery format is account number ---- password ---- name ---- secondary verification code
3.outlook email registration with address, digital order placed

two. Instructions for use

1. Log in to Amazon official website:
https:// www.amazon.com/ 2. Enter the account password.

three. Precautions

1. After payment, you can view the purchase account information on the purchase completed page, or you can click on the order center in the upper right corner to view the withdrawal, and 24 hours will be automatically delivered.

2. The account number is sold and deleted. The buyer protects the account number by himself. We cannot retrieve the stolen account number!

3. Overseas accounts cannot be used for a certain period of time. Please keep your ID active and change your password frequently. If there is an official withdrawal and deactivation, the platform cannot be retrieved. (Official acts, the platform does not assume responsibility)

4. Please be sure to change the password when you get the account number. If there are other verification methods (mobile phone, email or secret protection), please also change them. If you have any questions, please check the answers and tutorials directly.

5. Refunds are not supported once virtual goods are shipped (except for secret accounts).

6. If you need a large number of wholesale, you can contact our online customer service, who will arrange to transfer someone to contact you to discuss the price.

goodsDetail.tdkDetail:
Here's how you can buy Amazon Accounts:

  1. Create an Accountboy Account or log in if you already have one.

  2. Search for "Amazon Accounts" in the available account listings.

  3. Choose your preferred account deal (region, seller account, etc.) and click "Buy Now".

  4. Complete your purchase by entering your payment details.

  5. Congrats! You’ve successfully bought your Amazon account and are ready to shop or sell on Amazon!
